mapper.select: select q.board_idx,u.nickname,q.subject,q.register_date,q.status_id from users u,question_boards q where u.user_idx=q.user_idx and q.board_idx;
select program_id, program_subject, start_date, end_date, approval_date, approval_flg, organization_id from programs;
select * from programs where organization_id = #{organization_id} AND program_id = #{program_id}
select type from types where type_id = #{type_id}
mapper.update: update programs set approval_flg = #{approval_flg}, approval_date=#{approval_date} where program_id = #{program_id} AND organization_id = #{organization_id}
mapper.select: select stored_file_name from program_images where program_id = #{program_id} and organization_id = #{organization_id}
select user_type_id, user_id, name, nickname, grade, register_date from users where user_type_id = 1 OR user_type_id = 3
